passives.name: Preparation
passives.effects: After being [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] with enemy champions for 8 seconds, gain {{as|{{rd|11|5}} lethality}}. This bonus remains for 3 seconds after dealing damage to an enemy champion.

passives.name: Extraction
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants you {{as|200 '''bonus''' movement speed}} that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
